OOC: I moved this to this thread. I almost missed it since it was in
the sa=
me post as Tuscon moving into the Ark :)

> Night Shift keeps up with scorp=
onok, as he kicks up dust beneath his tires while he rolls over uneven grou=
nd without much trouble.
>
> " I dunno where that Matrix is now. I'm sure T=
ucson's already figured me out'n hid it somewhere else. It used ta be in Pr=
ime's chest, but I don't think that's where it is anymore. I know that bot =
Scorponok, he's not stupid. If he feels that somethn' ain't right, he'll go=
 out of his way ta make sure nothn' goes wrong. And I saw inside his chest,=
 he doesn't have it in 'em, that was a lie. If anything, he probably has it=
 hidden somewhere in a different grid all together."
>

Scorponok grunted a=
s he moved swiftly over the terrain, his form
easily able to traverse the u=
neven surface. While designed primarily
for sub surface travel, he appeared=
 to be doing quite well in the
terrain he was in.

"He moved it a couple of=
 grids away?" Scorponok sounded a bit
skeptical. "I thought the Matrix had =
to stay housed within Optimus
Prime's form?"

Even as they spoke Hydras' fo=
rtress came into view. In the air above
them Scourge in his air ship mode f=
loated out of the base and looked
around, seeming to almost immediately pic=
k up on Scorponok and
Nightshift's approach.

"Scorponok and Nightshift hav=
e arrived." Scourge said over his radio
link to Hydras and Cyclonus.

(TAG)=


Preston
